name: Booty Hunter
description: This is my first game and I hope that you all don’t take it to seriously. You start off searching for the best booty in the kingdoms surrounding you. There are a few hidden places so please search around :).  If you find the best booty then its over. I might add to it later on so just let me know what you would like and I’ll see what I can do! If you would like more information visit https://gparadise811024274.wordpress.com.
